nhc_headline: ...BERYL WEAKENS TO A TROPICAL STORM... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS CONTINUE OVER PORTIONS OF THE NORTHERN  YUCATAN PENINSULA...
summary:
...BERYL WEAKENS TO A TROPICAL STORM... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS CONTINUE OVER PORTIONS OF THE NORTHERN  YUCATAN PENINSULA...
 As of 1:00 PM CDT Fri Jul 5
 the center of Beryl was located near 20.8, -88.8
 with movement WNW at 15 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 986 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.
